title: bitbollo
author: bitbollo
created_time: June 30, 2022, 12:32:54 PMLast edit: November 15, 2022, 09:05:22 PM by bitbollo
content: I have the pleasure to offer in 1 unique topic the last 8 1 banknote "Moor's Head" made by Artikando at FIXED PRICE 0,001 btc !!!Appeared for the first time in bitcointalk section collectibles here:  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5395188.0 Also featured in scarce.city  auction here: https://scarce.city/auctions/moors-head-banknotesand in bitcointalk auction here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5402482.0Initial supply 21 (no reprint or second edition!)01 Banknote (7.80 cm x 18.8 cm)2 - (copy with red line) - printing error SOLD3 - (copy with red line) - printing error SOLD6 - KIEV on burin SOLD7 - No WAR on burin SOLD9 - Feb 2022 (write by Pen) SOLD10 - Money & Life (write by Pen) SOLD11 - B*NNK on burin12 -*XFFB on burin  SOLDNotes from Lot 2-3 (copy with red line) - printing error (7.80 cm x 18.8 cm) Notes from Lot 6-12 (18.8 cm x 7.80 cm) Shipping:  Additional to the winning bid. Ships from EU. Buyer responsible for any local customs/duties.Shipping at fixed price!0,00042 BTC Shipping Fee (EUROPE)or0,00054 BTC Shipping Fee (USA/Rest of the world)Escrow acceptedPayment accepted : BTC, LTC, ETH, ZCASH, other coins please ask before bidding About this production, the artist said: Drawing made strictly by hand.  The technique used is BIC pen, yes, just a pen and fantasy! Subsequently printed on a 90 gr paper individually have been individually numbered by hand, with an embossed stamp (unique identifier code of the banknote). It also created a fake watermark using only the colors and overlays to make it a particular note.  The project was born for fun, a challenge that I wanted to launch to try new drawing techniques, and for love I feel for bitcoins! I think the character represented is known to most people, made as a Moor's head (Sicilian) because the idea was born in this wonderful place that is Sicily. Many will turn up their noses, but this is also a peculiarity that distinguishes the work. The power of Bitcoin is still underestimated today. However, despite the numerous criticisms received in recent years, we are all aware that it is the road to change, we do not know where it will lead us, but we have indeed arrived here with many good intentions.    History of “Teste di Moro” https://emozioni-di-sicilia.com/en/blogs/news/teste-di-moro-una-storia-di-amore-eterno  FRONT of Banknote - On the right, next to the number 1 there is the word.  Each banknote bears a different word. It is possible to feel it by touch, this is done with a “burin”.-  Generally, where a distinctive sign has been added, it is possible to feel them physically.  - Above there is the phrase "Chancellor on brink of second bailout for bank" (quite iconic, that in our sector we all know "what it means").  - It is possible to see the author's signature "ARTIKANDO" inside the circle on the right (next to the "Moor's head")- The hash code you find below is the abstract text of the Satoshi Nakamoto paper converted to SHA256 https://bitcoin.org/bitcoin.pdf https://emn178.github.io/online-tools/sha256.html Quote Abstract. A purely peer-to-peer version of electronic cash would allow online payments to be sent directly from one party to another without going through a financial institution. Digital signatures provide part of the solution, but the main benefits are lost if a trusted third party is still required to prevent double-spending. We propose a solution to the double-spending problem using a peer-to-peer network. The network timestamps transactions by hashing them into an ongoing chain of hash-based proof-of-work, forming a record that cannot be changed without redoing the proof-of-work. The longest chain not only serves as proof of the sequence of events witnessed, but proof that it came from the largest pool of CPU power. As long as a majority of CPU power is controlled by nodes that are not cooperating to attack the network, they'll generate the longest chain and outpace attackers. The network itself requires minimal structure. Messages are broadcast on a best effort basis, and nodes can leave and rejoin the network at will, accepting the longest proof-of-work chain as proof of what happened while they were gone.834477a7041eb94488adf0dea7d3ef319761ffd6be6d30fdb75dc856ad0e9382   BACK of Banknote   - At the top there is a phrase that is "inspirational" for everyone “Change the world by thinking differently”. After all, bitcoin helps us to think differently about many aspects of our life, compared to what we have done in the past or compared to what the rest of the "no coiner" population does.  - At the bottom, on the back of the banknote is inserted in morse code  “Bitcoin is the best “  .- It is possible to see the author's signature "ARTIKANDO" inside the circle on the right (next to the globe).EDITPlease note: I can ship only tomorrow (Saturday 2 July) and then I am able to ship starting from 11-12 July !Please note: I am able to ship from first /second week of August !

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: would like to get 9 - Feb 2022 (write by Pen)let me know if this is available still and I can send pymt

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: I received my note from the original auction today and I have to say the item is really nice, really nice to see all the features described in the OP,The addition of the individualised hand stamping marks gives a unique touch.Hopefully ArtiKando produces a second series of notes, it is such a skill touse a BIC Biro to create these bearing in mind this is a printthere is no room for error unless you start again from scratch.Here is a montage of my note.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.created_time: June 30, 2022, 11:05:11 PMLast edit: July 01, 2022, 10:32:17 AM by bitbollo
comments.body: Thank you @aoluain for your review and the additional photos you wanted to share.[In your last pic it is possible to see the "lithographic rosette" typical of off-set printing! Well done! Much appreciated]I guess that Artikando  will delight us with some other "strictly made by hand" - "just a bic and phantasy" productions ... just matter of time  EDITPlease note: I can ship only tomorrow (Saturday 2 July) and then I am able to ship starting from 11-12 July !

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: it is really a pleasure to send these magnificent creations to the 4 corners of the globe As the author Artikando said: "change the wold by thinking differently"...We are probably already doing it and we don't even realize it!.... End of the "poetic vein"  ....LAST 4 BANKNOTES AVAILABLE!3 - (copy with red line) - printing error6 - KIEV on burin7 - No WAR on burin11 - B*NNK on burin0,001 BTC each one +shipping fee at fixed price!0,00042 BTC (EUROPE)or0,00054 BTC (USA/Rest of the world)Feel free to reply here or in private message for any request ENJOY!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Received mine today - looks great. The patience needed to avoid mistakes is paramount in these types of work. I was surprised that it appears to be a copy of a hand drawn note not an actual hand drawn note. I was hoping to be able to feel the pen lines.

comments.author: Crytocanuk
comments.body: Received mine as well! Absolutely stunning details and hours and hours of work to create this. I’ll defer to Aoluain’s pictures as mine won’t come close to his lol. Thanks again Artikando for sharing your work and Bitbollo for facilitating the sale!!

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Thank you guys for your reviews and comments  much appreciated!in the next few days unfortunately I will not be able to ship. but it is possible to reserve banknotes, last 4 of 21 still available! reply here or send a direct message. I am available also for any question!!!Please note: I am able to ship from first /second week of August !
